document_data.mainbody:
gris Accurate Maps was a shop located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The shop was located on the Throat outside of the Throat Gate of the Foreign Quarter. 
Maps of the ruins of Zhentil Keep following the citys destruction in the , could be purchased here for 5 gp, though the shops proprietor did not claim any responsibility for loss of life, limb, or property as a result of following one of his maps.
The shop was owned by a man named Ugris.
